patthana21.2:1.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:2.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā sahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe…
patthana21.2:3.1_0: Nasahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:3.1_1: Naahetukaṁ naabyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:3.1_2: Nasahetukaṁ naabyākatañca naahetukaṁ naabyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.2:4.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.2:5.1_0: Nahetusampayuttaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā …pe… hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.2:6.1_0: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.2:6.1_1: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.2:6.1_2: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa kusalassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa kusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:7.1_0: Naahetuko ceva nana ca hetu nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:8.1_0: Nahetu ceva naahetuko nakusalo ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu nakusalo ca dhammā hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:10.1_0: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana21.2:10.1_2: Nava pañhā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
patthana21.2:11.1_0: Nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana21.2:11.1_2: Nava pañhā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.
